title: The Safari Zone
description:
There are all kinds of rare and special Pokémon that can be found here!
If you choose to enter, you'll have a time limit of 3 wild encounters where you can try to catch these special Pokémon.

Beware, though. These Pokémon may flee before you're able to catch them!

2.label: Leave
2.selected:
You hurry along your way,
with a slight feeling of regret.

2.label: Throw Bait
2.tooltip:
(+) Increases Capture Rate
(-) Chance to Increase Flee Rate

3.label: Throw Mud
3.tooltip:
(+) Decreases Flee Rate
(-) Chance to Decrease Capture Rate

outro: That was a fun little excursion!
